description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Zafrani Garam Masala, a premium blend of aromatic spices. This 50g pack delivers rich, warm flavors perfect for curries, meats, and vegetables.  Its unique saffron-infused recipe adds a touch of luxury to every dish.

Key features include a 'V-Locked' freshness seal to ensure quality, a perfectly balanced blend of traditional spices including saffron, and a convenient 50g size ideal for frequent use.  The blend is free from artificial preservatives.

Enhance your cooking today!  Add depth and complexity to your favorite recipes with this versatile and flavorful masala.  Order now and experience the authentic taste of Shan.
